text.text: Hi there! Welcome to the SoMakeIt Slack workspace — the makerspace community in Southampton where you can explore, create, and learn. Here's a quick guide to get started:

*📚 Wiki*
Find detailed info on space, tools, safety rules, and policies.

*🧑‍🤝‍🧑 Members Area*
Manage your membership, access resources, and stay up to date.

*🕒 Official Opening Hours*
Tues: 18:00–22:00
Fri: 10:00–13:00
Sat: 10:00–13:00
(See Visit Us page for updates)

*💬 Useful Channels*
#general — For general announcements and discussion
#space-open-announce — Updates on space availability and events
If you have any questions or need help, feel free to reach out in the channels or ask any of our members. Enjoy making!
